item.title: Is the Women’s Centre for women only?
item.dc:creator: PR
item.description: No, the Women’s Centre welcomes both men and women. All students are encouraged to use its resources and attend programs. We are called the Women’s Centre because our mission is to promote the advancement of women and their well-being; a mission that men are invited to actively advocate and support.
item.content:encoded:
No, the Women’s Centre welcomes both men and women. All students are encouraged to use its resources and attend programs.

We are called the Women’s Centre because our mission is to promote the advancement of women and their well-being; a mission that men are invited to actively advocate and support.
